examples: Cover the chicken loosely with foil.
Cubre el pollo sin apretar con papel de aluminio.
She covered her face with her hands.
Se cubrió la cara con las manos.
I covered my mouth to stifle a yawn.
Me tapé la boca para reprimir un bostezo.
He laughed to cover (= hide) his nervousness.
Se rió para tapar (= ocultar) su nerviosismo.
